nodes.text: The Bank of Aargau was a bank that was broken into by a crew run by Zabrak criminal Easy Xiukhan. It utilized gigantic bank-courier repulsor trucks.
The Bank of Aargau was first mentioned in Star Wars Canon by the 2015 game Star Wars: Uprising, where it was mentioned in a quote found in the description for the unique crew member Easy Xiukhan.
The Bank of Aargau was originally created for the 1981 Star Wars Legends comic Star Wars 48 by Marvel Comics.
